inclusion.criterion: Able to understand the written patient information and to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CHF, NYHA-class I, II or III at visit 0
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Stable pharmacological treatment of heart failure according to ESC guidelines for the last 3 months prior to randomisation (visit 1)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction (MI), unstable angina or coronary revascularization within the last three months prior to visit 1
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Hospitalisation due to incompensated heart disease within 30 days prior to randomisation (visit 1)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on home oxygen. They have been admitted with complaints of worsening shortness of breath and have refused a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil.
